name: TOKYO WARFARE
description: Arcade battling in real life locations of Japan and around a healthy selection of bonus maps. Choose between five factions and engage in battle in fully destroyable anime environments or realistic looking bonus maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: W7 Processor: i5 6500 Graphics: GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: W7 Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Additional Notes: Oculus DK2 or CV1, Superwide monitor supported. for VR: high end CPU & GTX 9XX series
